mutants.original_line: return {word: freq for word, freq in frequency.items() if freq > 0}
mutants.mutated_line: return {word: freq for (word, freq) in frequency.items() if freq >= 0}

mutants.mutated_line: return {word: freq for (word, freq) in frequency.items() if freq <= 0}

mutants.original_line: return {word: freq for word, freq in frequency.items() if freq > 0}
mutants.mutated_line: return {word: freq for (word, freq) in frequency.items() if freq != 0}

mutants.mutated_line: return {word: freq for (word, freq) in frequency.items() if freq > 1}

mutants.mutated_line: return {word: freq for (word, freq) in frequency.items() if freq > -1}
